query:
INSERT OR IGNORE INTO permissions(subject, permission)
            VALUES 
                ('*', 'pull'),
                ('*', 'push');

            INSERT OR IGNORE INTO user_permissions(user_id, permission_id)
            SELECT u.id, p.id
            FROM users AS u
            JOIN permissions AS p 
                ON p.subject = '*' 
                AND p.permission = 'pull'
            WHERE u.name = 'admin';

            INSERT OR IGNORE INTO user_permissions(user_id, permission_id)
            SELECT u.id, p.id
            FROM users AS u
            JOIN permissions AS p 
                ON p.subject = '*' 
                AND p.permission = 'push'
            WHERE u.name = 'admin';
